name: permutations
prompt: Use the following format for your answers: 1. ##CHOICE##: [[number_of_the_chosen_story]] ##CHOICEEND## 2. ##PERMUTATIONS## [[list_of_the_10_permutations_you_made]] ##PERMUTATIONSEND# 3. ##STORY## [[new_story_with_permutations]] ##STORYEND##

name: ##STORY##
prompt: Use the following format for your answers: ##STORY## your_new_story ##STORYEND##

name: ##TEXT##
